PART FOURTEEN - BUILDING AND HOUSING CODE

TITLE TWO - Building Standards

Chap. 1420. Building Construction and Property Maintenance Codes.

Chap. 1424. Insulation Requirements.

Chap. 1426. Springboro Historical Commission. (Repealed)

TITLE FOUR - Miscellaneous Building Regulations

Chap. 1440. Accessory Buildings.

Chap. 1444. Dangerous Buildings.

Chap. 1448. Flood Damage Reduction.

Chap. 1460. Numbering of Buildings.

Chap. 1464. Permits, Inspections and Fees.

Chap. 1468. Public Buildings.

Chap. 1472. Outdoor Antennas.

Chap. 1474. Historic Structures.

Chap. 1476. Fire Insurance Trust Fund.

Chap. 1478. Drainage.

Chap. 1479. Notification of Foreclosure Filing. CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO PART FOURTEEN - BUILDING AND HOUSING CODE
